entry.title: New blog posts and Meetup talk
entry.summary: Recently, we added two new blog posts about the verification of the crypto-currency Tezos:
entry.content:
Recently, we added two new blog posts about the verification of the crypto-currency Tezos:

  • Verify the Michelson types of Mi-Cho-Coq to compare the types defined in the Tezos code for the Michelson interpreter and in the Mi-Cho-Coq library to verify smart contracts;
  • Translate the Tenderbake's code to Coq to explain how we translated the recent changes in Tezos to the Coq using coq-of-ocaml. In particular we translated the code of the new Tenderbake consensus algorithm.

We also talked at the Lambda Lille Meetup (in French) to present our work on coq-of-ocaml for Tezos. A video on the Youtube channel of the Meetup should be available shortly. We thanks the organizers for hosting the talk.

entry.title: Verification of the use of data-encoding
entry.summary: We added a blog post about the verification of the use of data-encodings in the protocol of Tezos. Currently, we work on the verification of Tezos and publish our blog articles there. We use coq-of-ocaml to translate the OCaml code to Coq and do our verification effort.
entry.content: We added a blog post about the verification of the use of data-encodings in the protocol of Tezos. Currently, we work on the verification of Tezos and publish our blog articles there. We use coq-of-ocaml to translate the OCaml code to Coq and do our verification effort.

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Welcome to the blog of Formal Land. Here we will post various updates about the work we are doing.
entry.content: Welcome to the blog of Formal Land. Here we will post various updates about the work we are doing.
